## Safety & integrity checklist
- [ ] No unsupported/unstated claims added
- [ ] Community claims are labeled as external/unverified
- [ ] Cross-run comparisons are aligned OR clearly marked directional
- [ ] Secrets/API keys are not included in code, docs, or artifacts
